Package gamelogic.model

Interface Game

All Known Implementing Classes:
DotsAndBoxesGame
public interface Game
Interface for a game. Inspired from the Tic-Tac-Toe game from Software Systems, in week 5.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Game
    deepCopy()
    Performs a deep copy of the game.
    void
    drawLine(Line line)
    Performs the move, i.e., draws a line, assuming it is a valid move.
    Player
    getOther()
    Query whose turn it is not.
    Player
    getTurn()
    Query whose turn it is.
    List<Integer>
    getValidLocations()
    Return all locations where a line can be drawn in the current state of the game.
    Player
    getWinner()
    Get the winner of the game.
    boolean
    isGameOver()
    Check if the game is over, i.e., there is a winner or no more moves are available.
    boolean
    isValidLocation(int location)
    Check if a location is a valid location.
    void
    updateScores()
    Updates the scores of the players when boxes have been drawn.

  • Method Details

    • isGameOver

      boolean isGameOver()
      Check if the game is over, i.e., there is a winner or no more moves are available.
      Returns:
      whether the game is over

    • getTurn

      Player getTurn()
      Query whose turn it is.
      Returns:
      the player whose turn it is

    • getOther

      Player getOther()
      Query whose turn it is not.
      Returns:
      the other player

    • getWinner

      Player getWinner()
      Get the winner of the game. If the game is a draw, then this method returns null (e.g., in case of a 4*4 board).
      Returns:
      the winner, or null if no player is the winner or the game is not over

    • getValidLocations

      List<Integer> getValidLocations()
      Return all locations where a line can be drawn in the current state of the game.
      Returns:
      the list of currently valid moves

    • isValidLocation

      boolean isValidLocation(int location)
      Check if a location is a valid location.
      Returns:
      true if the move is a valid move.

    • drawLine

      void drawLine(Line line)
      Performs the move, i.e., draws a line, assuming it is a valid move.

    • updateScores

      void updateScores()
      Updates the scores of the players when boxes have been drawn. A completed box corresponds to a score increase of 1.

    • deepCopy

      Game deepCopy()
      Performs a deep copy of the game.
      Returns:
      the entire game at the current state.
